poster: U N L 3 A S HD
title: Hacked and in priority que
body: Didnt play pretty much all summer but logged in to find out someone had been using my account and constantly trying to use my credit card which is old. This person spent all my ip(miniscule) and by some stupid reason he changes my mastery names to Shit credit card and your runes are broken. Can someone please check this out or do mods just not care. Nothing was stolen but this is garbage that im in low priority que and I always noticed you get hacked in whatever game/account after not playing for extended time.

replies.body: We absolutely care, and want to help!  Fill out our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can work with you individually to investigate and review reparation.  In the meantime, I highly recommend going over our [account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to secure your info.  We'll see you in your ticket!
